directions: In a small bowl, combine mayonnaise, sweet pickle relish, vinegar, mustard, sugar, turmeric, dill, and parsley.  Mix well, and reserve.

Place drained tofu in large bowl, and crumble with a fork.  Stir in onion and celery.  Mix in reserved mixture.  Season to taste with salt and pepper.  Chill for several hours to allow flavors to blend.
ingredients: 1 pound firm tofu, sliced and well drained
title: Almost Eggless Egg Salad
